doc.title: Eduard Sachariev i dokumentalnoto kino
doc.plot: This film is about the documentary cinema of Edurd Sachariev. It deals with a story of the film "Salt", which is now without negative. The Film "Salt" didn't have access to the international film festivals; regardless of that it is one of the best Bulgarian documentaries. Memories of their friend told by film film directors Juliy Stoyanov, Nevena Tosheva, Gueorgui Stoyanov, Oskar Kristanov and the cinematographers that worked together with him Ivan Tzonev and Kliment Stamenov.
